channel.title: Bob Weinstein on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Bob Weinstein on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Harvey Weinstein Drops Fraud Claims Against Bob Weinstein
item.description: The former mogul had sued his brother and others at the Weinstein Company saying he had been forced to guarantee a $45 million loan that he alleged was not used to help the company.
